Class SimulatedMicroscope

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.device.sim.SimulatedDevice
org.jscience.device.sim.SimulatedMicroscope
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Device, Microscope
public class SimulatedMicroscope extends SimulatedDevice implements Microscope
Simulated implementation of Microscope.
Since:
1.0
